textarea.name: rss_text
textarea.value: MythTV is a Free Open Source software digital video recorder (DVR) project distributed under the terms of the GNU GPL - It has been under heavy development since 2002 - Now it contains most features one would expect from a good DVR and many new ones that you soon won't be able to live without - This theme is based on and inspired by the original XBMC skin called Aeon by Duncan Harris - When using this theme you should select the customized menu called 'MythAeon' as this menu lay-out and items are tailored for this particular theme

buttonlist.helptext: Press 'up', 'down, 'left' and 'right' arrows to move through the files and folders. Press 'select' or 'enter' key to select the file or folder.
